# longZight

Longitudinal data visualisation tools for iNZight and other users.

Provides tools to enable the easy visualisation of longtiduinal data using Tidyverse-like syntax.

## Package Installation

The `longZight` package is not yet included on CRAN, installation can be accomplished by installing using from GitHub using the `remotes` package.

```{r eval=FALSE, include=TRUE}
remotes::install_github('njtierney/brolgar')
remotes::install_github('snjnz/longZight')
```
